[[ğ“‚š]] Teti Hor-[[Aha]] 2nd pharao of first dynasty or [[menes]] himself?  

Arrows @ Horus [ğ“‚š](ğ“‚š) :  

In [sumer](Sumer)ian similar-sounding words such as "life" and "arrow" [ti] were written with the same symbol  

[ğ“‹¹](ğ“‹¹) @ Horus arrows:
